void tgf::TraceRay ( Ray &  ray,
QMap< InstanceNode *, QPair< SbBox3f, Transform * > > *  sceneMap,
InstanceNode *  instanceNode,
InstanceNode *  lightNode,
TPhotonMap &  photonMap,
RandomDeviate &  rand 
)

Traces the given ray with the scene with top instance instanceNode and saved the intersections information in the photonMap.

The sceneMap saves the scene elements BBox and Transform in global coordinates.

References InstanceNode::Intersect(), Photon::m_intersectedSurface, Photon::m_next, Ray::maxt, Ray::origin, and TPhotonMap::Store().
